text: Khueŋ guigira, nza mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi nza shogim, nza vhɨzgi. Nza za vhɨzgi gumgi fara muuŋgiap wari ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgim, Fhe Bakɨmen kora muumbar, ana guigira kɨvgi. Ana guigira won ndavar nza nɨɨŋgi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza muuŋgim, nza Krais phorgap taagia khavgi fara muuŋgiap wari kav, nza tɨvir ŋkaa zɨn vui. Ahaŋ, Fhe Bakɨmen kora muumbarara, ana taagia nza ndigi.
